title: You wake up snuggling with your favorite champ

replies.body: I'm pretty sure I'm going to jail
I'm guessing {{champion:1}}

Maybe he was just babysitting and they fell asleep while watching a movie and eating ice cream.

You know how kids are, treating adults like monkey gyms.

I hope.

me: hey, um Cho, how and why are you here?
{{champion:31}}: Do not question it human, now go back to sleep.
me: um bu-
{{champion:31}}: *uses Feral Scream*  go back to sleep!
{{champion:55}} I'd Just snuggle with her and hope she doesn't kill me.
What if she rolls around in her sleep and accidentally ults?
Don't worry, she'll get tangled in the sheets and CC herself.
OMG Kat isn't even going to kill you just cc her noob.
Use your knockup.

Knockup
heh
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Wow, this is so many versions of awkward... I don't have a number one favorite, so I'll go less awkward...

{{champion:131}} "Ugh, another evil day under the accursed sun..."

Me "Um, good morning?"

{{champion:131}} "How dare you praise the sun!" (*lifts sword from the bedside table*)

Me "Whoa, Hey, don't... uh... Did you hear that one about the Moon going for a walk?"

{{champion:131}} "No, enlighten me thrall."

(*several bad joke exchanges later*)

Me "So, what do you do all day if you despise the sun?"

{{champion:131}} "Close the blinds and shut the door if you want to find out."

Me "O_O ummmm... wow, I mean, ok... If you want to..."

{{champion:131}} "I have this AWESOME lava lamp  shaped like the moon! I watch it all day long!"

Me "Oh. Yeah. That's cool too..."

{{champion:82}}...

Me: ...

{{champion:82}} ...

Me: ...So we never speak about this again?

{{champion:82}} Don't worry about that. *Rips out soul. Gets out of bed. Has a good day.*
